      • queryToList

        public java.util.List<?> queryToList(java.lang.String sql,
                            java.lang.String params)
        put data into list use webservice.
        参数:
        sql - exam: "select plan_code from plan where plan_code like ? and rownum <= ?"
        params - exam: "P055%,10"
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • queryToMap

        public java.util.Map<?,?> queryToMap(java.lang.String sql,
                            java.lang.String params,
                            int lineNum)
        put data into map use webservice.
        参数:
        sql - exam: "select plan_code from plan where plan_code like ? and rownum <= ?"
        params - exam: "P055%,10"
        lineNum - exam: 5
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • queryToMap

        public java.util.Map<?,?> queryToMap(java.lang.String sql,
                            java.lang.String params)
        override queryToMap method use default line number 1.
        参数:
        sql - exam: "select plan_code from plan where plan_code like ? and rownum <= ?"
        params - exam: "P055%,10"
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • execModify

        public int execModify(java.lang.String sql,
             java.lang.String params)
        execute dml(insert/delete/update)/ddl sql statement.
        参数:
        sql - exam: "update plan set paln_code = plan_code where plan_code like ?"
        params - exam: "P055%"
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • execProcedure

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> execProcedure(java.lang.String procName,
                                             java.lang.String paramDesc,
                                             java.lang.String params)
        execute procedure, get output in parameter list.
        exams: execProcedure("gpos_package_calculate.calc_susp_days", "iiiooo",
        "GP02000000469462,2012-01-01,2012-05-05,null,null,null");
        参数:
        procName - exam: package_name.procedure_name
        paramDesc - exam: i:input, o:output; etc: "iiii" means 4 input parameters
        params - all out parameter will be put in string typed array.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • execFunction

        public java.lang.String execFunction(java.lang.String funcName,
                            java.lang.String paramDesc,
                            java.lang.String params)
        execute function, get output in string.
        exams: execFunction("add_months", "ii", "sysdate,3")
        参数:
        funcName - exam: add_months
        paramDesc - exam: i:input, o:output; etc: "iiii" means 4 input parameters
        params - out will be a string.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
